description:
Training Report, Final Day
Goals Review
Erotisize service: The core of this slut's program is simple - teach her the value of satisfaction derived from a job well done. Does she get it? You be the judge.
Enter into long term contract: She has faithfully maintained the rules set forth in this shoot ever since, and her d/s contract has been put in place.
Earn a collar: Earned leather is the most valuable, and Madison has worked very hard for her first piece.
Review: Instruct her in the proper way to walk in heels, starting her in bondage at the end of a whip. Drill her on what she has learned about being a detail oriented little fuck toy and make her prove it.
Present the opportunity to prove her submission by fucking another man, and licking his hot come off a cold plate.
Once she is used up, administer a final beating with a 2x4 till she collapses in orgasm, then pick her up, lock a collar around her neck and put her in her proper place.
title: The Training of Madison Young, Day Four
